vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.1.10;
father of: Gamaliel (H1583)
§ Pedahzur = "the Rock has ransomed"
father of Gamaliel who was the chief of the tribe of Manasseh at the time of the exodus
vocabInfos._es_Definition: padre de Gamaliel; tribu de Manasés
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
比大蓿 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "磐石已贖回"
出埃及時代為瑪拿西支派首領迦瑪列的父親
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
比大蓿 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "盘石已赎回"
出埃及时代为玛拿西支派首领迦玛列的父亲
